channel.title: Misson Control on strandedinspace
channel.description: Recent content in Misson Control on strandedinspace

item.title: See inside Mission Control
item.description: Ever wonder what goes on behind the scenes at SIS Mission Control? Get a sneak peek into the R&D that ensures our Flamingo Cosmonauts are fully prepared for interstellar flight and communication. We will continue to post images of our production as our underpaid and overworked staff consult with Robotic Exploration Technicians, Astrophysicists, MOES/POES specialists, Heliophysicists, JASD’s, Cosmological experts, and even so-called ‘Speculative Cosmologists’ to ensure that our intrepid travelers are safe, sound, and sentient.
